search_results.snippet: Caf du Monde. Caf du Monde (French (help. info)) ; French for "Caf of the World"), is an open-air coffee shop on Decatur Street in the French Quarter of New Orleans, Louisiana, United States. It is a New Orleans landmark, known for its caf au lait and beignets.
